  19. #ifdef CAML_INTERNALS

  21. typedef enum {
  22.   Phase_sweep_and_mark_main,
  23.   Phase_mark_final,
  24.   Phase_sweep_ephe
  25. ‌} gc_phase_t;
  26. extern gc_phase_t caml_gc_phase;

  28. ‌Caml_inline char caml_gc_phase_char(gc_phase_t phase) {
  29.   switch (phase) {
  30.     case Phase_sweep_and_mark_main:
  31.       return 'M';
  32.     case Phase_mark_final:
  33.       return 'F';
  34.     case Phase_sweep_ephe:
  35.       return 'E';
  36.     default:
  37.       return 'U';
  38.   }
  39. }

  41. intnat caml_opportunistic_major_work_available (void);

  64. /* Forces finalisation of all heap-allocated values,
  65.    disregarding both local and global roots.

  67.    Warning: finalisation is performed by means of forced sweeping, which may
  68.    result in pointers referencing nonexistent values; therefore the function
  69.    should only be used on runtime shutdown.
  70. */
  71. void caml_finalise_heap (void);

  73. /* This variable is only written with the world stopped,
  74.    so it need not be atomic */
  75. extern uintnat caml_major_cycles_completed;

  77. double caml_mean_space_overhead(void);
